abstract: BP said Thursday that it would pay Devon Energy $7 billion for assets in Brazil, Azerbaijan and the Gulf of Mexico, and that the two firms would form a joint venture to develop an oil sands project in Alberta, Canada.
snippet: BP said Thursday that it would pay Devon Energy $7 billion for assets in Brazil, Azerbaijan and the Gulf of Mexico, and that the two firms would form a joint venture to develop an oil sands project in Alberta, Canada.
lead_paragraph: BP said Thursday that it would pay Devon Energy $7 billion for assets in Brazil, Azerbaijan and the Gulf of Mexico, and that the two firms would form a joint venture to develop an oil sands project in Alberta, Canada.

headline.main: BP Buying Devon Energy Assets for $7 Billion
